metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0849 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[predictable temporary file vulnerability]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0849` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pycode-browser - 1:1.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pycode-browser package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.0-2').
